Hey, I am Vishesh from New Delhi, India. I am 21 years old. I have completed my B.C.A (2017-2020) from Maharaja surajmal institute. I am a passionate Full Stack Web Developer.

I like to design, code up the front end look and logic of the website as much as i like to build the back end Restful API, algoritums and data storage solutions. Things i like to do apart from web development are watcing and reading about technology, philosophy, economy and current affairs. Sometimes i also like to solve problems on competitive programming websites using Javascript.

banner

_

_

Vis blog is a website for anyone, who wants a simple and powerful blogging platform.The website is beginner-friendly but powerful enough to create, manage, and distribute informative blogs.

Vis blog front end is developed by using react.js and back end is written in node.js and MongoDB is used for storage.

_

Let's Donate targets to ease the interaction between the NGOs and users. It spreads the awareness about the upcoming NGO events among its users. It also helps the users to find the NGOs near their location by using the location of the user device.

Let's Donate front end is written in core technologies (HTML, CSS & javascript). And the server side is written in node.js. MongoDB is used for data storage.

_

Expensify is a small and very useful React.js web application. It helps the users to keep track of there expenses. It provides the interface to create, edit, remove there daily expenses.

Expensify front end is written in HTML, CSS and React.js. Firebase services are used for the Back end part. Firebase Database is used for the Data storage and firebase Auth is used to create and manage users account.
